I live outside the USA, so any amazon items I get I have to send to my freight forwarder, who then ships to me. Needless to explain that I cannot then return items as shipment from where I live is too costly and amazon returns dont apply outside the USA. I ordered size 7 in this shoe, that is a 37 in European sizing, the shoe arrives as a 39. It is too big and I cannot return. Besides that it looks nice although colour was a little more dayglo than anticipated. I  bought it specifically for water fall abseiling on a jungle adventure I was going on, I wore them anyway with socks for the extra space, but they are the most slippery shoes ever, after having a fall and then realizing how hard and plastic the soles are, they certainly are not for slippery rocks and muddy paths etc.

These are my favorite shoes ever

评论概述: Comfortable barefoot shoes for wide feet
评论详情: These are the first barefoot type shoe I've worn. When I first ordered them the first pair arrived and the stitching was crooked so the shoe was misshaped.  I sent them back and got another pair and they fit great. I love the flat feeling when I walk. It's a completely different feeling from even a 1-in heel like Crocs or standard hiking shoes or boots. They're very flexible and don't overheat. When I've gotten them fully wet from walking in wet grass they dry very quickly. Your feet do get a bit dirty because you're down on the ground in the dust and dirt however. I have wide feet and a bunion and they're very comfortable to walk in. I wear them for everyday wear, to the store, walking through the neighborhood, hiking in the woods. They have thicker protection points at the ball of the foot and heel. That is helpful but you can feel larger sharp rocks through the shoe. They're so comfortable I'm considering getting a pair as a second set of house shoes. I'd highly recommend these especially if you have wide feet.

评论概述: Love them, but need different insoles
评论详情: I absolutely love these shoes. They have great traction.  I needed a shoe that Is low to the ground for traction, but yet toe space. Really easy to get on. Great price. I just need to find a different insult because after wearing them for a long period of time the sides of my feet and sometimes the middle of my feet kill me!
I thought the rubber sole would be heartier and the seams tore within 2 months.

Currently recovering from chemo related side effects, needed a good running shoe on a budget. I no longer hurt after long runs & walks! No more issues with plantar fasciitis with their fantastic arch support. Easy to clean, cute color, true to size, good traction. Easy to take on and off, holds its form well. My back, knees, feet, muscles, and bones thank you!

评论概述: The perfect shoe for people with toe spread
评论详情: I have been suffering most of my life squashing my toes into narrow bear trap shoes for work. It’s miserable. The second I get to my car the shoes come off. I have major toe spread from being a barefoot girl. Wide shoes never fit right. When I discovered barefoot shoes I was so excited. I don’t really like how they look but omg are they comfortable. The pads had to come out right away, they squished the top of my toes. They’re plenty wide enough, very comfy. I didn’t even take the off on the way home from work. I mean, I’d still rather be barefoot but it’s not socially acceptable so here we are. I’m ordering another color. If your can’t wear bear trap shoes anymore, buy these.

评论概述: I like them but they are very different.
评论详情: When I purchased these I think I hadn’t expected the bumps on the front to look very prominent, like toes but they look very much like toes. I think they are cute and so does my boyfriend and they perfect for what I wanted them for which is barefoot shoes and correcting the position of my toes from tight shoes without enough room in them, but I have gotten some comments about their appearance from coworkers particularly about the look of the toes.

I was attracted to these because they appeared to be a celery green. In other words, a green found in nature. Even Apple green would have been fine. Neon green, not so much. However, they're very comfortable, and I don't have time to wait for something else to arrive.
They are very wide and not as comfortable for the pain i was dealing with my feet

These shoes are amazing! I always wear them. I stand on equipment or concrete all day. I also jump rope in them. I have no more pain in my feet at all! So worth the money. When the time comes I'll be getting another pair for sure!!
These barefoot shoes are so comfortable I absolutely love them  feels like I'm walking on air i will be ordering more in the near future. They are roomy ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

When I was ordered these shoes, I was expecting them to fit weird. However, when I put them on my feet and laced them up, I was amazed at how comforable they are on my feet. I LOVE them! No break in was required.  I am going to order a second pair.
These are thee most amazing tennis shoes I've ever had!!!!! I'm going to be buying another pair!

I just received -  "Weweya Barefoot Shoes for Women Minimalist Running Cross Training Shoe"  I have a few barefoot shoes.  All of them you can "feel" the ground.  But these, while still being "barefoot" have a thicker sole which when walking you don't feel the ground as much but still feels like a barefoot shoe.  They have  a medium arch support & inside the shoes it almost looks like a satin lining.  They are strong & well made.  I am a size 10 & I got a size 10.  However, if I planned on wearing a thick sock I would have sized up to the 10 1/2  (Sixze 10 - Big toe hits the top of the shoe)  They have a good grip on the ground  They are wide in the front but not as wide as I see some barefoot shoes.  I would recomend these shoes

Update: If you have sensitive skin and blister easily, which I do, the plastic trim on the outside might irritate your skin. With thick socks these are fine, but without socks, or thin socks, the outside of my foot is being rubbed raw by the decorative plastic. Unless I desperately want a specific color, I probably won't buy this brand again.  Original: In a perfect world, I wear a 9.5 wide. I ordered these in a 10 to be safe. (Amazon suggested I order the 9-9.5 Upon arrival, the size inside says 42. They were the exact same length as my Joomra's which are labeled as 41 (10-10.5). These fit just like my Joomra's and have plenty of room. These have an insert that does have minimal arch in it. These will be removed as soon as I purchase a flat insert for cushion.

If you're looking for the super thin bottom shoes that feel like bare feet, these are not them. The bottoms on these are thick and not very flexible. The rubber is hard. I ended up tossing these.

This size 10 1/2 pink barefoot shoe is half a size bigger than I normally order, but I find it to be a good size for my needs. I am a senior and will not be running in these shoes, but hope it’s good for walking as well as the gym. It also takes an orthotic which is something I was looking for. Since I do need a little support. Sure it’s kind of big and bulky, but I’m more interested in comfort. And very comfortable it is. I can wiggle my toes and walk with movement in my foot, barefoot style. So, at first blush, it looks like just the thing for me.

评论概述: Very comfortable shoes for an elderly person but a couple issues I didn't like.
评论详情: I really like these shoes but there were issues I had. For the pros, they have the roomy toe box, they have removable arch supports, they are very cute, they have reflector tabs for night walking or running, I can get them on and off without untying the shoes. They have soles more like tennis shoes so walking on stones would not be a problem and they look like tennis shoes.  The cons are the right shoe pressed the top of my toenail up into the toe box which I did not like. I removed the liner/arch supports which solved that problem but now I don't have arch supports. And another negative is the fabric under the removable arch support liners is a slick fabric almost like satin material which I think could cause my feet to sweat. I am elderly and have no intentions of running or exercising in these. I just ordered them because of bunions and they are perfect for that.
Son para usar dentro del gym, no en exterior, pues creo que no resistirían.
Comfortable shoes for working out! Absolutely love them!

I really like these shoes, though getting used to the barefoot feeling is a bit different. A lot of the reviews said that these ran small and to order a size up, but I have very narrow feet and found the opposite to be true. I normally wear a size 8, and those were much too big for me, so I had to send them back and order a size 7-7.5, and there is still a lot of room in the toe box. I have been wearing them with socks and overall they are pretty comfortable after a few weeks of getting accustomed to them.  Update: After less than four months of daily wear, there's a hole in the sole and I need to replace them with something more durable.
Feels good and look good
The shoe has a very wide toe box. My feet are wide, but this toe box is too big for my foot. Next time I will order a smaller size. I’m normally a size 6.

I initially bought these for working in the health field. The fit was good, but they are extremely slippery on wood laminate flooring. I slipped and bump my arm into the corner of a wall. It could have been worse. I do not recommend these shoes for  any type of everyday activity. They did however, work on my treadmill where it is rubber on rubber contact.

I thought these would be thinner, but there is a lot of upper padding that makes them very warm in only slightly warm weather. I don't see myself wearing them much. They do fit nice and are comfortable, just warm. The soles are thicker than I would have liked, but less constrictive than regular shoes. The green is bright and stands out from a distance.
Love the feel of this shoe wears very well

评论概述: If you want to wear socks at all buy the next size up.
评论详情: These are cool shoes. I wish I had bought the next size up though. I wear a size 8 so I bought the 8-8.5. They only fit if I take the insoles out and wear no socks. I didn't feel like going through the return process since it's not an easy exchange process. You have to do a return and then a new purchase. If you want these buy the next size up!
The shoes are well made,  but not very comfortable.  Perhaps they just need getting used to.
I bought these to pack in my carryon and use as workout shoes. Very comfortable and work great for what I bought them for!

The rubber sole comes up and over the toe area on the top of the shoe. This does not allow for flexing the toe comfortably. Shoe fit well everywhere else so I couldn't go up a size. My toes felt pinched top to bottom and the toenail on my big toe rubbed into the rubber toe covering with each step.
Really happy with these, great fit. I had to go up a further half size.  Love the color and these are really comfortable.  Would definitely buy again.
Like everything about these. Will be ordering another pair
I liked the concept, but  the sizing was a little off.  They were attractive and looked like a regular jogging shoe.  I will probably reorder at some point.
Shoe does Not last. Sole wore out in 2 months Customer service tried to pay me $10.00 to go away lol.
Used to be able to get a decent hiking shoe for $40...These feel like the $15 shoes on the clearance rack at Walmart. They also run way too small.

These are amazingly comfortable even after hours on my feet on concrete. They are also great for weight lifting since they are zero drop and have a grippy sole.  I have thrown them in the washing machine, and they come out really clean, almost like new, but be careful if you do that. Use the gentle cycle. I did not, and I think the extreme spin cycle cause the heel structure to crease a little bit. They are still super comfy though, and you can't really tell to look at them. I would buy them again and would buy more now of they had a better color selection.
